name: rwb
description: This is a repository for demonstration purposes. Following the README on the github provides insights further and gives a developer this environment (HTML-CSS-JS-TYPESCRIPT) with its source code included. Files are original content, created by me -I'm Robert- throughout the site's creation. Please be responsible with this source code and feel welcome to learn from randomwebbits.
author: Robert A. Howell

scripts.dev: npm install -g gulp-cli && npm install --save-dev typescript gulp@4.0.0 gulp-typescript && npm install --save-dev browserify tsify vinyl-source-stream && npm install --save-dev watchify fancy-log && gulp
